text: Smokin' Aces is a 2006 American crime thriller movie. It is about a Las Vegas Strip magician who became a mafia informant and the FBI agent who is assigned to protect him. Taraji P. Henson plays Sharice. Ray Liotta plays Donald. Alicia Keys plays Georgia. The movie got negative reviews from critics. It made more than $54 million worldwide. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2006 crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Nevada
title: Smokin' Aces
